text: @realDonaldTrump More hate and division from our Idiot in Chief and still zero plan in sight to battle the exploding Coronavirus which soon will take down our financial markets to add to the Depression-era jobs numbers.  Well done Captain Bonespurs.  Way to lead the country headlong into reverse!
